events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on relevant keywords found in their resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully; candidate shows strong knowledge in software development and relevant technologies.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2PM UTC with the senior engineering panel.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
HR interview is scheduled for May 12th to assess the candidate's cultural fit and discuss benefits.
HR interview completed positively; candidate aligns well with company values and expectations.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their experience.
Candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
Candidate accepted the job offer formally and finalized start date arrangements.
Candidate has started onboarding process, including orientation and setup with the engineering team.
The hiring process for the engineering position is now successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
